selected.title: Upgrade to a Walk-in Shower
selected.description: Replace the existing shower with a modern walk-in shower featuring glass doors and updated fixtures. This enhances accessibility and adds a contemporary touch.

selected.title: Install Heated Flooring
selected.description: Add electric heated flooring to provide comfort during the cold months. This is a desirable feature in the Niagara Region's climate.

selected.title: Vanity and Countertop Replacement
selected.description: Replace the existing vanity and countertop with modern, high-quality materials. This can significantly enhance the bathroom's aesthetic and functionality.

selected.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
selected.description: Install energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures to improve the bathroom's ambiance and reduce energy costs.

selected.title: Add a Double Sink
selected.description: Install a double sink to increase convenience and appeal to potential buyers, especially families.

selected.title: Upgrade to Quartz Countertops
selected.description: Replace existing countertops with durable and stylish quartz. This upgrade enhances the kitchen's aesthetic appeal and increases property value.

selected.title: Install Energy-Efficient Appliances
selected.description: Replace old appliances with energy-efficient models. This not only reduces energy bills but also appeals to eco-conscious buyers.

selected.title: Add a Kitchen Island
selected.description: Introduce a kitchen island to increase workspace and storage. This addition is highly functional and attractive to potential buyers.

selected.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
selected.description: Install modern, energy-efficient lighting fixtures to brighten the space and enhance the kitchen's ambiance.

selected.title: Repaint Cabinets
selected.description: Refresh the kitchen by repainting the cabinets with a modern color. This cost-effective update can significantly improve the kitchen's look.

selected.title: Basement Insulation
selected.description: Add insulation to the basement walls and ceiling to improve energy efficiency and comfort. This is a relatively simple project that can significantly reduce heating costs.

selected.title: Basement Bathroom Addition
selected.description: Install a bathroom in the basement to increase the home's functionality and appeal. This involves plumbing work and can be a valuable addition for large families or guests.
